data.message: Please take note that I have repeatedly request for Facebook security to stop this user Toni Tails from hacking my profile and taking away my 1st Amendment rights of freedom of speech and I demand that Facebook security stop Toni Tails from hacking my profile, I have blocked her several times but that's just a joke about this problem because this user has been hacking my profile,  regardless of whether I have blocked her, but she's still hacking my profile please do something about this problem and alow me to continue with my 1st Amendment rights of freedom of speech and support for my beliefs in support of the American Flag

replies.message: Hi Tammy. We're sorry you're experiencing this. If you think your account has been taken over by someone else, you can report it here: http://bit.ly/2x801Ho. Additionally, we have several helpful tools you can use to better secure your account and recognize attempts to compromise your information. To learn more about these tools and how to keep your account safe, visit Privacy Basics at: http://bit.ly/2yz7ZMW. -Tenaya

I am disabled, and I am not able to walk or use my left arm and hand, I am in a wheelchair,  I have reported this user, and blocked Toni Tails, this was the only advice from the Facebook security team

Please assist me with the security of my account, I suggest that Facebook shutdown the user Toni Tails from Facebook, she is a scam artists and using Facebook to try to peddle her own website, but it is harassment and stressful for me during this time of recovery in my health, I use Facebook to make contact with my family members who are in different States, and I am very happy that I am able to show or message my family because of my extremely poor health conditions,  please contact Toni Tails and demand that she stops harassing me, and taking my 1st Amendment rights of freedom of expression, and speech to support my nations flag
Thank you for responding to my posts and I will contact The ADA for my civil rights to express my freedom of speech to the American Flag
Facebook has the ability to take care of the harassing user Toni Tails
